title: The Messengers: Discovered
description: Everything about fifteen-year-old Simon’s life is decided by his government: his curfew, his meals, even his fun. When Simon begins to notice nighttime visitors and hidden messages, he realizes that his nation is even dictating what he’s allowed to know. There’s a truth out there to be discovered, a truth the government will stop at nothing to eliminate. Join the Messengers as they risk their lives to protect it.https://www.cph.org/messengers
author: Lisa M. Clark
